id.description: A unique identifier of this modpack

name.description: Human readable name of this modpack

summary.description: A short summary of the modpack, typically just a sentence

description.description: A longer description of the modpack

releaseDate.description: The release date of this version of the modpack

updates.description: A URL linking to where updates can be fetched

dependencies.description: Dependencies required for installation of this modpack

minecraft.description: The version of Minecraft to use

fabric-loader.description: The version of fabric-loader to use

forge.description: The version of Minecraft Forge to use

files.description: A list of files to install

path.description: The path where this file will be placed

sha256.description: An SHA256 hash of the file

optional.description: Whether or not this file is optional

env.description: The environment where this file is allowed

client.description: Whether or not this file is allowed on the client

server.description: Whether or not this file is allowed on the server

downloads.description: URLs where this file can be downloaded

items.description: A URL where this file can be downloaded
